hillburrow/water-carrier.about-dynamite: Nasty habit, going through other people's stuff.
hillburrow/water-carrier.about-job: I'm the water carrier. I collect water from the well, and I deliver it to people that need it.
hillburrow/water-carrier.about-npc: I'm {{npc}}. I'm just doing my job.
hillburrow/water-carrier.about-sabotage:
He starts fidgeting a little bit, then goes:
No, I don't know anything about... nothing.
hillburrow/water-carrier.about-water-carrying: Ya know... I don't think there are things such as a good or a bad position. If I had to summarize my life so far, I'd say it's all about ponies, ponies who offered a hoof to me when I was alone, and it's a bit curious to think that chance forges destiny, because when you love something being well done, the nice gestures, sometimes you don't find the proper partner, the mirror that helps you move forward, and it wasn't my case, as I was saying, because on the contrary I was able to, and I thank life for that, I'm singing life, I'm dancing life, I am only love, and lastly when ponies ask me "but where do you find that humanity", well I answer to them in all simplicity that it comes from my taste for love, that taste which pushed me to carry water today, but tomorrow, who knows, to give myself to my family through the gift of myself.
hillburrow/water-carrier.ask-about-dynamite: I was asking because I was just taking a look over there, and I found stacks of dynamite, locked in your shed.
hillburrow/water-carrier.ask-about-home: I'd like to know: the shack near the well, you're the one who lives there, right ?
hillburrow/water-carrier.ask-about-npc: Hey. I was just wondering who you were and what you were doing ere.
hillburrow/water-carrier.ask-about-sabotage: I'm just asking because someone's been stuffing dynamite in places where it shouldn't go, near the coal mine. You wouldn't know anything about that, would you ?
hillburrow/water-carrier.ask-about-water-carrying: Intersting. And in that economy, would you say water carrier is a good position ?
hillburrow/water-carrier.ask-talkative-sarcasm: You're not the talkative type, are you ?
hillburrow/water-carrier.confession-ask-about-murdering: Out of curiosity, what would you do to someone who would threaten to
hillburrow/water-carrier.confession-ask-about-orders: You don't look like a snitch to me. Whoever told you that was clearly worried about nothing.
hillburrow/water-carrier.confession-exit: Your secret is safe with me. As long as the Potioks get fucked, I'm a happy pony ! Keep up the good work, mate !
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-ask-details-again: Oh, come on ! We're both friends with Mister Bibin, aren't we ?
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-ask-password: You're also supposed to give me a password. What is it ?
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-contents-entry: Oh. Sorry, I'm not supposed to tell anypony.
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-contents-failure: Yes, but Bibin told me not to tell anypony. You are anypony. I can't tell you.
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-contents-success: I guess you're right... it's boomsticks. I have to plant those in the coal mine every once in a while.
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-exit: Well, my work here is done ! See you later !
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-message-received: Oh, er... hi ! Thanks ! I won't disappoint !
hillburrow/water-carrier.delivery-tell-message: He says hi, and he wants you to keep up the good work !
hillburrow/water-carrier.interrogate-sabotage-1: Look, you don't have to hide anything from me. I hate the Potioks, and the fact that they're working slaves to death over there. I think it's great you've been damaging their operation. I won't tell on you.
hillburrow/water-carrier.interrogate-sabotage-2: You're lying. The next thing that comes out of your mouth better be the truth, else your next chat will be with our goddesses in the beyond.
hillburrow/water-carrier.interrogate-sabotage-give-up: Nothing. Don't worry about it. I'm gonna go now, bye !
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-about-bibin: I can't tell you. I promised I would never tell.
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-about-bibin-2: Okay. I'm part of Bibin's family. I used to be just a bum in the Cristal Den slums. But he took me in, fed me, taught me... then he got me a job of water carrier in this town... then he sent me instructions. He told me where to get some dynamite, and how to set up the traps. I just did how I was told.
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-about-bibin-press-further: You got yourself in a very tricky situation. Things are about to turn really bad for you unless you tell me everything I want to know. Start talking.
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-ask-about-bibin: And just who told you to set up explosives in the mine ?
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-confession: Oh, good ! I was worried you'd tell on me ! I was told not to let the Potioks know about me, that maybe I'd let something slip if I got caught me.
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-confession-more: Darn right I'm no snitch ! What kind of pony would I be if I were to give away the people who are most like a family to me ! I used to be just a bum living in the streets before Bibin took me in ! Had no friends, no family, no future ! Now I help the family, and the family helps me !
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-go-to-potiok-boss: I'm taking you to Bitty Potiok. I'll make sure you tell her all the details.
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-intimidation-fail: Oh... no... not again... I'm sorry. I can't let people know about this.
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-intimidation-success: Please, don't hurt me ! I've been doing everything I was told to do. I'm just trying to be a good family member. I don't understand why everpony's so mad about it !
hillburrow/water-carrier.sabotage-let-go: Alright. I was just curious about it. I don't care that you sabotaged the mines. I'm gonna go now. See you around !
hillburrow/water-carrier.start-bibin-delivery: I've got a delivery for you from a common friend in the Cristal Den slums.
